00015 // JA2 GOLD: for weapons and attachments, give penalties only for status values below 85
00016 #define WEAPON_STATUS_MOD( x ) ( (x) >= 85 ? 100 : (((x) * 100) / 85) )
00017 
00018 // Special deaths can only occur within a limited distance to the target
00019 // Madd
00020 #define MAX_DISTANCE_FOR_MESSY_DEATH 7
00021 #define MAX_BARRETT_DISTANCE_FOR_MESSY_DEATH 23
00022 // If you do a lot of damage with a close-range shot, instant kill
00023 #define MIN_DAMAGE_FOR_INSTANT_KILL 55
00024 // If you happen to kill someone with a close-range shot doing a lot of damage to the head, head explosion
00025 #define MIN_DAMAGE_FOR_HEAD_EXPLOSION 45
00026 // If you happen to kill someone with a close-range shot doing a lot of damage to the chest, chest explosion
00027 // This value is lower than head because of the damage bonus for shooting the head
00028 #define MIN_DAMAGE_FOR_BLOWN_AWAY 30
00029 // If you happen to hit someone in the legs for enough damage, REGARDLESS of distance, person falls down
00030 // Leg damage is halved for these purposes
00031 #define MIN_DAMAGE_FOR_AUTO_FALL_OVER 20
00032 
00033 // short range at which being prone provides to hit penalty when shooting standing people
00034 #define MIN_PRONE_RANGE                         50
00035 
00036 // can't miss at this range?
00037 #define POINT_BLANK_RANGE 16

00187 #define AMMO_DAMAGE_ADJUSTMENT_BUCKSHOT( x ) (x / 4)
00188 #define NUM_BUCKSHOT_PELLETS 9
00189 
00190 // hollow point bullets do lots of damage to people
00191 #define AMMO_DAMAGE_ADJUSTMENT_HP( x ) ( (x * 17) / 10 )
00192 // but they SUCK at penetrating armour
00193 #define AMMO_ARMOUR_ADJUSTMENT_HP( x ) ( (x * 3) / 2 )
00194 // armour piercing bullets are good at penetrating armour
00195 #define AMMO_ARMOUR_ADJUSTMENT_AP( x ) ((x * 3) / 4)
00196 // "super" AP bullets are great at penetrating armour
00197 #define AMMO_ARMOUR_ADJUSTMENT_SAP( x ) (x / 2)
00198 
00199 // high explosive damage value (PRIOR to armour subtraction)
00200 #define AMMO_DAMAGE_ADJUSTMENT_HE( x ) ((x * 4) / 3)
00201 
00202 // but they SUCK at penetrating armour
00203 #define AMMO_STRUCTURE_ADJUSTMENT_HP( x ) (x * 2)
00204 // armour piercing bullets are good at penetrating structure
00205 #define AMMO_STRUCTURE_ADJUSTMENT_AP( x ) ( (x * 3 ) / 4)
00206 // "super" AP bullets are great at penetrating structures
00207 #define AMMO_STRUCTURE_ADJUSTMENT_SAP( x ) ( x / 2 )
00208 
00209 // one quarter of punching damage is "real" rather than breath damage
00210 #define PUNCH_REAL_DAMAGE_PORTION 4

00236 typedef struct
00237 {
00238  UINT8      ubWeaponClass;             // handgun/shotgun/rifle/knife
00239  UINT8      ubWeaponType;                                          // exact type (for display purposes)
00240  UINT8      ubCalibre;                 // type of ammunition needed
00241  UINT8      ubReadyTime;               // APs to ready/unready weapon
00242  UINT8      ubShotsPer4Turns;          // maximum (mechanical) firing rate
00243  UINT8      ubShotsPerBurst;
00244  UINT8      ubBurstPenalty;                                  // % penalty per shot after first
00245  UINT8      ubBulletSpeed;             // bullet's travelling speed
00246  UINT8      ubImpact;                        // weapon's max damage impact (size & speed)
00247  UINT8      ubDeadliness;                                          // comparative ratings of guns
00248  INT8 bAccuracy;                                             // accuracy or penalty
00249  UINT8      ubMagSize;
00250  UINT16     usRange;
00251  UINT16     usReloadDelay;
00252  UINT8      ubAttackVolume;
00253  UINT8      ubHitVolume;
00254  UINT16     sSound;
00255  UINT16     sBurstSound;
00256  UINT16     sSilencedBurstSound;
00257  UINT16     sReloadSound;
00258  UINT16     sLocknLoadSound;
00259  UINT8      bBurstAP;                                                         // Snap: Burst AP cost replaces bBaseAutofireCost
00260  UINT8      bAutofireShotsPerFiveAP;
00261 
00262  INT8 szWeaponName[MAX_WEAPON_NAME_LENGTH+1]; //+1 for the null terminator
00263  UINT32     uiIndex;
00264 
00265  BOOLEAN swapClips;
00266  UINT16     silencedSound;
00267  UINT8      APsToReload;
00268  UINT8      maxdistformessydeath;
00269  BOOLEAN NoSemiAuto;
00270  UINT8      AutoPenalty;
00271  INT16  sAniDelay;          // Lesh: for burst animation delay
00272  UINT8      APsToReloadManually;
00273  UINT16 ManualReloadSound;

00275 } WEAPONTYPE;

00293 typedef struct
00294 {
00295       UINT16            ubType;                             // type of explosive
